tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ProjectIntegration (
    project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(255),
    integration_platform VARCHAR(100),
    synchronization_status BOOLEAN,
    data_connector_id INT,
    data_connector_type VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE ProjectManagementTool ( 
    project_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    project_name VARCHAR(255), 
    project_description TEXT, 
    project_start_date DATE, 
    project_end_date DATE 
);

CREATE TABLE projects (
    project_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE tasks (
    task_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    task_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    task_description TEXT,
    priority INT,
    project_id UUID REFERENCES projects(project_id)
);

CREATE TABLE tasks (
    task_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    project_id INT NOT NULL,
    task_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    task_description TEXT,
    task_status VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'To Do',
    task_due_date DATE
);
